DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to establish an optimal threshold Early parathormon (PTH) assay in order to exclude hypoparathyroidism , that is to say to obtain a negative predictive value of hypoparathyroidism highest possible.
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Dose of Parathyroid Hormone as a Marker for the Occurrence of Hypoparathyroidism After Total Thyroidectomy
